He was shot outside of Kabul four days ago by one of my competitors - Listen, Will, choose a side, or move aside. BARNEY hangs up. WILL slowly closes his PHONE as he strug to make sense of it all.
BARNEY walks to his truck and enters. KONG is sitting in passenger seat.
What’d you want to talk about?
My life.
That shouldn't take long. BARNEY fires up the engine and pulls away.
A high angle shot of BARNEY’S TRUCK driving along the fri of the city.
So what's wrong with your life?
I want a raise.
INT. BARNEY’S TRUCK - NIGHT BARNEY flips on the RADIO to an OLDIES station.
Why do you deserve a raise?
I been with you longest - I work harder than the others.  94.
What makes you say that?
They’re taller - Everything is more work for me.
(sighs) C'mon —
When I get hurt, the wound is twice as big -
- ‘Cause you’re smaller.
(nods ‘yes’ ) When I travel I have to go farther because -
- You're smaller.
(nods ) And I’m Chinese.
So?
So I’m smarter - Smarter’s worth more.
You’re getting ridiculous.
We’re smarter.
No.
Have highest I.Q. (Barney shakes his head 'No.’) Who’s smarter?  95.

Technically Western Jewish descendants. KONG. Bull shit - Suddenly the rear window of BARNEY'S vehicle shatters and blizzard of tiny glass shards blast through the car. More shots and the front windshield is blown to pieces. BARNEY and KONG whip around and see an SUV charging towar them. BARNEY floors it.
It’s Gunnar!
Should’ve shot ‘im when I had the chance.

is behind the wheel of the SUV and is bearing down hard o BARNEY and KONG. BARNEY swings his truck onto an intersec highway and roars towards an older industrial part of the city. The highway is nearly deserted but there are enough vehic present to cause a half dozen near misses as BARNEY and GUNNAR weave through the oncoming cars. All the while, KO and GUNNAR exchange sporadic gunfire. BARNEY tears down a wide alley barely keeping several lan ahead of GUNNAR who manages to get off several shots. In the near distance he spots a FREIGHT TRAIN moving in t opposite direction. He races towards it with GUNNAR in ho pursuit. BARNEY floors it as his truck is getting dangerously clos intersecting the monster FREIGHT TRAIN. The RAILWAY CROSS LIGHTS begin to flash, but BARNEY barrels ahead.
What are you doing?!
Again, GUNNAR attempts to draw a bead on BARNEY while kee an eye on the freight train, but the road’s too rough to a clean shot.

BARNEY’S TRUCK Streaks across the TRACKS missing the train by at least 5 YARDS. GUNNAR is also going to make it safely across, but to his horror, he sees BARNEY from the other side of the tracks, whipping the truck into another 180 DEGREE TURN. BARNEY g the PISTOL from KONG and fires headlong at GUNNAR’S SUV.

GUNNAR involuntarily SLAMS on the breaks, bringing the SU a skidding stop nearly in the center of the tracks. GUNNAR’S EYES bulge as the immense FREIGHT TRAIN rams int the rear QUARTER PANEL of the SUV, sending it PIN WHEELIN YARDS off the tracks and past BARNEY and KONG, then capsi over an embankment. BARNEY and KONG leap from the truck and charge over the EMBANKMENT. Cautiously moving forward, BARNEY checks the in his PISTOL’S CLIP.

With it’s HEADLIGHTS still on, the badly damaged vehicle on it’s side, STEAM pouring from under the hood. BARNEY a KONG approach and notice the driver side door is open. BARNEY motions for KONG to swing wide while he approaches SUV. BARNEY approaches from an angle that permits him to fully inside. Suddenly the GUNSHOTS rip through the silence and the rea passenger window explodes inches away from BARNEY’S HEAD.  97. He dives to the ground as more BULLETS tear into the car’ metal.

BLOODY and badly shaken up, he puts his pain aside and ru forward. Suddenly BARNEY rolls from his position and FIRE back, but GUNNAR holds his ground and returns FIRE. Sudde the high caliber PISTOL is KICKED from GUNNAR’S hand and falls a short distance away. KONG rushes into view and commences to ferociously attack GUNNAR with all his fury. Completely caught off guard GUN is dazed and staggers against a clump of TREES. KONG goes for the kill, but GUNNAR rises and strikes KONG with an arching back fist delivered by his MASSIVE ARM. Now it’s GUNNAR’S turn to attack.

flips the door mounted AUTO SEARCHLIGHT into the darkness the BEAM settles on GUNNAR who kicks KONG with such brute force, KONG is sent flying, and collides in a semi-consci state. GUNNAR glares into the stark white BEAM of the AUTO SEARCHLIGHT. BARNEY sees GUNNAR in his sights and is abou shoot.

No!! He’s mine! KONG attacks GUNNAR who again dominates with his incredib strength and grabs KONG by the throat in a similar fashio the first scene. KONG cracks GUNNAR against the EYE which frees him up. KO now zeroes in on his stunned opponent and proceeds to ral back. Badly weakened by the barrage, GUNNAR’S knees are repeatedly assaulted until the huge man drops to one knee Glinting in the car beam is his PISTOL only a foot from h hands.

(aiming) Gunnar it’s over - Don’t move!!  98. GUNNAR seizes the PISTOL and KONG leaps on him. But in a burst of barbaric strength, kicks KONG aside and trains t PISTOL dead into KONG’S face. BARNEY squeezes off a SHOT and GUNNAR collapses to the ground. KONG glares at his foe and backs off as BARNEY approaches. They pass each other while looking straight ahead.
I would've won.
(walking straight past) Maybe. GUNNAR is moments away from death. Blood seeps from a fat CHEST WOUND.
I tried.
Came close.
Needed money.
Should've asked me.
(soft revelation) Shit - I’m dyin.’
- Looks that way - Who hired you, Gunnar? GUNNAR weakly shakes his head.
You’re not telling. GUNNAR’S eyes indicate he’s remaining silent.
An asshole to the end. GUNNAR’S eyes slowly shut. He’s moments from death.  99.

You know you’re dying - So what difference will it make - I’d tell you - I'll pay for your funeral and scatter your ashes right before the next battle, fair enough? GUNNAR’S eyes slightly open and his BLOODY HAND weakly ri and seizing BARNEY’S shirt, slowly pulls him forward.
Leaning against the DAMAGED SUV, the SEARCHLIGHT’S BEAM i directly over his shoulder as he watches the moment betwe BARNEY and GUNNAR play out, then respectfully angles the SEARCHLIGHT to the ground.
Shafts of LIGHT manage to seep through the overhead floor SANDRA has taken quite a battering. PAINE observes from t background.
She says she was paid to show ‘em around - Says she never saw them before.
She’s lying - You get her family?
No, no family - I want her dead.

No, I’ve secured clearance for a SEAL team to arrive early morning the day after me and I need you to make sure your soldiers are told to stay the hell out of their way. General, I need to find out everything, keep the girl alive.
MONROE hangs up just as her SECRETARY knocks and enters holding a sealed 8 X 10 MANILA ENVELOPE.  100.
This just arrived -

Leave it. The SECRETARY nods and exits. With her mind still preoccupied, MONROE opens the ENVELOPE and sees a WALLET. Opening the object, her eyes narrow as they come to rest GUNNAR JENSEN’S DRIVER'S LICENSE. Clipped to the back is NOTE. “ONE ACT OF VENGEANCE DESERVES ANOTHER - LOVE, B.” MONROE’S heart sinks.

INT. HALE CAESAR’S — DAWN BARNEY'S team is seated around the empty restaurant enjoy a “hearty” breakfast of left-over Mexican food. HALE CAESAR is flipping through a THICK FOLDER that lies the center of a LARGE TABLE.
In the past six months only four men have flown to Corza with European passports and they’re all with the same company.
Smarter than you look.
But you’re not.
C’mon, keep going -
(pained) I can’t eat this stuff.
Then don’t, Pinche! Who cares? KONG tosses down a taco and covers it with a PLATE. HALE CAESAR is highly insulted.  101.
Enough.
Don’t like tacos, but eatin’ rats an’ cats is cool?
We don’t eat cats!!
(raising his fist) Somebody’s going to be eating this. (to Hale Caesar) Go on, damn it.
MONROE is being driven away when WILL appears and steps i front of her car.
The DRIVER faces MONROE, who’s face is reddening.
You know him?
(exiting) Stay in the car. WILL approaches MONROE.
What do you want? Is there a problem?

There’s no Al-Tais, there’s no terrorist cell, there’s nothing! So you tell me, what’s there!? INT. HALE CAESAR’S RESTAURANT - KITCHEN -— DAWN BARNEY is paging through the DATA that HALE CAESAR has compiled.  102.
Renaissance Holdings, LP. It’s this German multinational company out of Munich that deals in shipping, land and -
Oil -
Yeah, oil.
- There it is.

Here’s some pictures of some of the Board of Directors - The Chairman is this dude here, Helmut Ernst, he’s the main man, and the CEO of the whole thing. (hands over a photo) That’s him. BARNEY’S eyes darken as he stares at the photo. HELMUT ER was the German-looking fellow who supposedly was MR. CHUR “BSSISTANT.”
Christ -

(picking up another photo) Looks good for a ‘dead’ guy. Check it out. CHRISTMAS hands the PHOTO to BARNEY. It is a picture of t supposedly MURDERED GRANDSON, standing with CHURCH, HELMU ERNST, and several OTHER MEN, now looking quite alive.
A close-up of the PHOTO of CHURCH’s “Grandson” laying murdered in a ditch.
Got a name for him?
No - Probably some flunky.
BARNEY angrily tosses the pictures on the table.
MONROE’s face is contorted with anger.

Come on! Open your god damn eyes! What’s the one thing in this world, that our agency would protect to make sure that we’re never at the mercy of any other country? A major find - a couple hundred miles off our shores and you don’t think our government should control that?
It’s not the government, it’s you using the agency as a front!

You’re an agency ‘turncoat,’ a walking joke, who nobody would ever believe, so stick to chasing bottom feeders like Ross and his losers! No, forget that, thanks to you the ‘Seals’ have other plans for them, so back the fuck off, or it’s over for you too!
MONROE turns and re-enters her VEHICLE.
The GROUP
(to driver) Let's go!
is still gathered around the table as BARNEY paces.

This Church guy was fronting for this ‘Renaissance’ Company ‘cause they were in with the last president. But the agency must have caught wind of what was goin’ down on Corza and backed a coup with Garza, who they’re controllin’. (MORE )
HALE CAESAR (cont'd) So how does Renaissance get back on track? Have us wack Garza, throw the place into chaos, then these shitheads come back in and pick up where they left off -
What do you want to do?
Do? We’re ready - We should go.
I say hell with it - They’re all thieves, let ‘em kill themselves off. Why we going and maybe get shot up?!
‘Cause we’re paid to go!
‘Cause some girl you’re feeling sorry for?
Then stay back.
Yo, any man willin’ to get killed for some bitch he ain’t known for one damn day is ignorant!
(standing) Don’t call me ignorant!
(rising) Then don’t make me get ‘ignorant’ on your ass!
Hey, both of you, back off! - (to Caesar) You out or in?
And have all you all talkin’ insultin’ shit about me? (to Christmas) She better be fine.  105. CAESAR extends his fist and CHRISTMAS bumps it in a gestu of camaraderie.
She’s not bad.
.-.-Let’s go to war.
INT. WILL’S OFFICE - NIGHT The MAN is slumped behind his DESK. Though his body langu appears lifeless, his EYES are incredibly alive. Hundreds thoughts race through his mind.
The PLANE is dock side. RICHARD, HALE CAESAR, and KONG ar loading the large craft with CRATES of WEAPONS. CHRISTMAS guides a HAND TRUCK with what appears to be a large defla ZODIAC RAFT.
Somebody gimme a hand with this!
is seated in the COCKPIT. He is presently on the PHONE. Through the cockpit WINDOWS, we see the MEN below loading aircraft.
If we don’t have the palace secured by 05:00 hour, we’re dead.
CHURCH is being driven by the YOUNG MAN, BILL, who was se as the FAKE DEAD GRANDSON in the photo. Seated in the rea CHURCH and his boss, HELMUT ERNST.  106.
If we do, you can land there by 5:15.
Alright - Good.
BARNEY is seated in the COCKPIT.
There’s one thing -
What’s that?
The full amount’s got to be doubled and split between the account numbers that you received - This isn’t negotiable.
Why double?
Take it or leave it.
CHURCH covers the MOUTHPIECE and faces HELMUT ERNST.
He wants double to continue. HELMUT’S lips tighten. Then almost imperceptibly he nods consent.
Alright - Done.
For your grandson.  107.
..-Yes. (hangs up)
WILL’S OFFICE - NIGHT Still immersed in thought, WILL’S expression begins to co to life. His EYES denote a revelation. Energized, he bolt upright and exits.
In the moonlight the commanding SEAPLANE glides gracefull above the open sea.
In the rear compartment, RICHARD, HALE CAESAR, and KONG s among the CARGO, each lost in their own thoughts. BARNEY and CHRISTMAS are in the COCKPIT.
Think she’s alive?
.-.-Don’t know - It’s true what Caesar said, you barely know this woman.
That’s not the point.
What’s ‘the point’?
The point is being where you’re needed, even if you’re not asked to be there, because it’s the right thing to do.
So you’re doing it for yourself.  108.
Don’t complicate it, okay? BARNEY pulls out a BOX of ASHES then opens the side COCKP WINDOW.
What’re you doing?
Spreading Gunnar - I promised him.

.+-You just poisoned about a hundred whales. BARNEY shrugs and pulls out a FIFTH of BOURBON and takes slug. He passes it to CHRISTMAS who does likewise. This i standard ritual before going to battle. CHRISTMAS rises and faces the other MEN.
Kong. KONG steps forward and taking the BOTTLE, drinks then pas it to HALE CAESAR, who does likewise then RICHARD.
“,...Do all the good we can, by all the means we can...” The MEN join in.
“In all the ways we can...In all the places we can...To all the people we can...For we will never pass this way again...”
WILL is on fire as LICKSON keeps pace with him.
If there was a chance the agency was involved, Ross knew which team we'd send because he was a C.O. with Seal Team One for ten years - Jesus! How'd I overlook that? (MORE )
WILL (cont'd) And that alias he used at the storage house with the fake attack data was planted, he wanted it found!
I got a hold on a company jet.
I set him up -
- It’s alright, we’ll be there before he is.
A SMALL GROUP OF HEAVILY ARMED NAVY SEALS peer into the n with their NIGHT VISION GOGGLES (NVGs).
Way in the distance, CORZA slowly comes into view.
As the ZODIAC drifts to a silent landing, the SEAL team l out and moves quickly inland.

With MILITARY ISSUE HATS pulled low and wearing full CAMM MAKE-UP, the SEALS glide up the silent streets. Rounding the corner they come upon a group of SOLDIERS. T SOLDIERS grip their weapons. The SEALS prepare to battle.

(in Spanish) They’re the ones they told us were coming. The LEAD SOLDIER waves them on.  110. EXT. PRESIDENTIAL PALACE —- NIGHT The powerful presence of PAINE moves down the shadowy hallway, and arrives at a DOUBLE-DOOR ENTRANCE flanked by GUARDS. The guards stand aside as he rumbles past. INT. GARZA’S OFFICE - NIGHT The door opens. We see the arrogant body language of GENE GARZA, as he nervously paces while puffing on a CIGAR. SA is seated in a chair, HANDS BOUND. Her face is BRUISED an her nose is BLEEDING.

I understand what you’re going through, but knowing this man, it'll get worse - It’s the General’s call. The General’s the one who’s at risk, and wants you ‘gone.’ That’s wrong, no one should be tortured unless they’re lying, and truthfully I think you are Sandra - I need the truth or I can’t help you.
.-.I know nothing.
(entering) The SEALS are here. GARZA glances over at MONROE, who is flushed with supreme confidence.
(sips brandy) All is good, General. MONROE gestures to PAINE.
(indicating Sandra) We'll finish with her later.
The FIVE SEALS are seen jogging to the PALACE, which loom the distance.
SANDRA is pulled roughly by a pair of GUARDS, who fling h into a DARK CELL. The METAL DOOR slams shut.
GARZA’S eyes reveal great agitation, but his slow gesture are unsettling to MONROE.
They will stop these men who come to kill me - You know this?
They’1l be ‘removed’, yes -
If not, you will be -
(patiently) When you threaten me, you threaten the whole agency - That is not good business, General.

The SEALS arrive at the towering gates, which are flanked two GUARD TOWERS. As the gates begin to grind open, we no see clearly the ‘SEALS’ are BARNEY, CHRISTMAS, RICHARD, K and HALE CAESAR. The GATE continues opening, revealing a CLUSTER OF CURIOU SOLDIERS. As the gates FULLY open, our boys behold a HUNDRED AND FI soldiers spread out before them. BARNEY eyes ADDITIONAL SOLDIERS on walls. BARNEY gestures to CHRISTMAS then eyes the base of the gu tower rising beside CHRISTMAS.  112. The SOLDIERS part as PAINE and the other TWO AMERICAN OPERATIVES approach.
Dan Paine, Head of General Garza’s security detail. Even though PAINE has seen a picture of BARNEY before, th uniform and DARK CAMMO make-up make identification impossible.
(stepping forward) Sir, you aware of our orders?
(nods ) Yeah - just take these Assholes out.
Where’s the General now?

(gestures) His private quarters. He’ll be there until this is over. PAINE points to the highest balcony where they see GENERA GARZA’S outline standing at the railing. GARZA’S cigar sm drifts like a ghost in the dead night air. The FAINT FIGU of MONROE is seen standing off to the side.
We need to inspect the ‘kill zone’ from every vantage point.

(tersely) A couple of these monkeys will show you around - Report back to me when your done. CHRISTMAS subtly places a SMALL RADIO DETONATE CHARGE on inside leg of the GUARD TOWER as they move off. INT. PALACE (GARZA’S CHAMBERS) - NIGHT Sipping whiskey, GENERAL GARZA gazes at the PHOTO of hims It depicts Garza atop a makeshift stage, addressing a lar crowd in the center of the city. On both sides of him are heavily armed SOLDIERS.  113.
(distantly) .+-How long before the fight begins?
Within 24 hours give or take, but it won’t be a fight, General. Everything's under control. GARZA stares blankly into space - The man’s fucking nuts.

BARNEY, KONG, CHRISTMAS, HALE CAESAR and RICHARD move pas SOLDIERS’ BARRACKS, which are nothing more than row after of TATTERED TENTS and DILAPIDATED SHACKS. The hefty guide SERGEANT GOMEZ, dully gestures toward the area.
(in Spanish) ..-This is where we all sleep - Over there we grow food.
Is this guy stupid?
(stepping away) Looks that way. The SARGENT takes offense as RICHARD translates.

(annoyed) Tell this idiot to move his ass or I’1ll kick his ass! They start to move off, but the sound of a SLAMMING DOOR attracts their attention. HALE CAESAR steps to a large GR in the ground, and looks down.
Check it out. The MEN cross over. Looking at least 15 feet down, they s JAIL GUARD lighting a cigarette.
(anxiously) See anyone?  114.
Too dark.

(in Spanish) It’s nothing! Come on! (inflamed, to Christmas) And you! I don’t like the way you talk like shit to me, I ama Sargent - A BLUR passes in front of the SERGEANT’S face as KONG kic the chunky slob in the jaw. The man collapses in an inglorious heap.
(gestures toward Kong) Broke his neck. KONG shrugs as BARNEY, HALE CAESAR and RICHARD drag the SERGEANT into a corner of the palace.
Check watches - 3:36 - All good? Glancing at their WATCHES, they all nod in unison.

20 minutes to slice this place up - You all know your sectors - Now hit it fast and hard; good luck. KONG, HALE CAESAR and BARNEY start to move off, RICHARD pauses and feels for the Sergeant’s pulse. There is none.
Pockets of SOLDIERS form themselves into groups.

A pair of GUARDS are stationed at the end of a long corri KONG comes into view. His SILHOUETTE is seen dashing acro the hallway past the slumping guards...He places another RADIO ACTIVATED CHARGE against a SUPPORT COLUMN, then gracefully disappears.
HALE CAESAR enters a pitch black room and flips on his MI FLASHLIGHT. Placing an EXPLOSIVE next to several large we worn GENERATORS, he’s gone.
GENERAL GARZA’S CHAMBER The demented soul is pacing to and fro, as his anxiety mounts. More DRINKING. MONROE shines her WRISTWATCH, just biding her time.
RICHARD plants a rigged charge against an ARCHWAY.
On the second floor, he places an EXPLOSIVE in another strategic locale.

A pair of GUARDS move down the dim hallway on the third floor. A FOOT flies out of the doorway knocking one guard cold. CHRISTMAS sweeps the second GUARD off his feet and him to sleep with an elbow to the forehead. He places an EXPLOSIVE and splits.
Now in the basement, we see by the glow of his MINI- FLASHLIGHT the placing of a TIMED CHARGE next to BARRELS FUEL.

passes the doorway to an open office, and though dimly li sees a GUARD taking a leak from the second story window. Smash cut of an elbow to the side of the head. The GUARD drops while still in the act of relieving himself. HALE CAESAR slaps a rigged charge on the wall and exits.

moves cautiously down the hall. Behind a door, he hears h footsteps approaching. With cat-like agility, he leaps on large wooden hallway CHAIR, then bounds up to an overhead BEAM. A split second later, PAINE and the TWO AMERICAN OPERATIVES exit, passing directly beneath KONG. He places charge on the BEAM and drops from view.

slips down the hallway, approaching GENERAL GARZA’S Chamb as he prepares to take out the two SENTRIES. PAINE and th TWO AMERICAN OPERATIVES turn the corner. CHRISTMAS slips into an ADJOINING ROOM as the behemoths p Without hesitation, he places a CHARGE at the base of the wall, and exits out of the window.
plants a charge against another portion of the palace’s FOUNDATION. Checking his WATCH, he bolts off with a heightened sense of purpose.
is balanced precariously on a ledge overlooking a hundred fifty SOLDIERS below. He starts to glide away when GENERA GARZA’S enraged voice stops him cold.  117.
..-It is your job, your work to know these things! Who wants to kill me!?
Eyeing the nearest WINDOW, he crosses the eight foot span LEAPS just as the BALCONY DOORS violently swing open and GENERAL GARZA charges into view.

still being carried by the momentum of his leap, rolls to feet just as a GUARD holding a FLASHLIGHT opens the door. The LIGHT BEAM catches CHRISTMAS dead center, but without much as a nanosecond of hesitation, he whips out his THRO KNIFE.

glides down the dark stone corridor. He pauses. In the distance, he sees the glow of a CIGARETTE belonging to a guard sitting in front of the dank cell occupied by the former President, MIGUEL FUENTES.
GENERAL GARZA'S CHAMBERS -— BALCONY The GENERAL'S eyes are clouded over. PAINE and the TWO OPERATIVES just stare at the unpredictable dictator.
Your government tries to trick me and take it all!
Not true, General.
You are stupid - Maybe the people hired these men to kill me - They want their old leader back!? You said “Don’t kill him, don’t make him a martyr!” (MORE )
GARZA (cont'd) (to Paine) Bring the woman back here now! She knows who is doing this! Bring her now!
MONROE realizes rational thought with GARZA is out of the question.
(to Paine) Get her.
is still slumped in his deceased mode. A pair of PALACE SOLDIERS discover the BODY.
A SILENCED SHOT blows the GUARD off his chair.
swings open and the emaciated ex-president, MIGUEL FUENTE terrified by the feral image of BARNEY in full battle ATT
(smoothly) Miguel Fuentes?
(in Spanish) Who are you?
Come with me - BARNEY quickly pulls MIGUEL forward. He gestures to a nea CELL.
There is another here -  119. BARNEY unlocks the CELL DOOR, sees it’s SANDRA and pulls upright. Looking into BARNEY’S menacing camouflaged face, is terrified.
(in Spanish) No! Who are you!?
You know me - Let’s move.
C’mon! BARNEY leads her out.
THREE NAVY SEAL ZODIACS traverse silently through the moonlight water. In the distance, a few faint LIGHTS from city appear against BLACK TERRAIN.

BARNEY, MIGUEL and SANDRA move down a large tunnel, which dully lit by several LOW WATT hanging bulbs. Suddenly BARNEY is blind-sided by the butt of a black AX HANDLE, and drops. PAINE steps from his concealment behin ALCOVE. MIGUEL and SANDRA turn to flee, but slam into OPERATIVES #1 and #2.
Pull him up!! OPERATIVE #2 grabs the dazed BARNEY in a lethal choke hol and yanks him upright. PAINE roughly wipes the cammo make-up off BARNEY’S face.
Son of a bitch!
RICHARD, HALE CAESAR, KONG and CHRISTMAS have dropped to knee. Their anxiety mounting.
Times up - What’s your call?
We're goin’ back in - Give us 10 minutes - If we’re not back, try to save your own ass. They bolt off as HALE CAESAR checks his WATCH.
His fists slam into Barney’s mid-section with colossal fo followed by a blow to the jaw that buckles his knees.
Who hired you?! PAINE blasts him again.
Give me answers now, or you’re dyin,’ right here! Another BODY BLOW sags BARNEY'S knees. Glancing up, he se movement through the OVERHEAD GRATE. It’s CHRISTMAS and K
(fist clenched) Who hired you!? I will pull you inside out! Who?

(barely a whisper) You’re mother. Enraged, PAINE draws back his CLUB for the kill shot. KON drops through the overhead GRATE and brutally sidekicks P against the head. PAINE crumbles to one knee, then KONG n AMERICAN OPERATIVE #2. CHRISTMAS drops down next, slamming a potent heel kick in OPERATIVE #3's midsection.  121.

head_text.subj: FLOW BATTLE. TO DESCRIBE THE ACTION DESIGNED FOR THIS SCE

text: WOULD TAKE MANY PAGES, SO TRUST ME, IT’LL BE LIKE NOTHING SEEN BEFORE. Just when this extraordinary battle scene appears over, a band of TEN SOLDIERS charge into the cavernous corridor. instantly OPEN FIRE. Lethal chunks of MORTAR and STONE are ripped from the wal as the torrent of bullets rain down on OUR BOYS. PAINE and the OPERATIVES hug the floor for dear life. BARNEY pulls MIGUEL FUENTES out of the line of fire. CHRISTMAS pulls SANDRA into a RECESS in the cement wall, whips out his NINE MILLIMETER and returns fire, but takes SLUG in the forearm. His PISTOL drops to the ground. But, a brazen act of bravery, SANDRA drops low and retrieves h PISTOL. Flushed with confidence, the SOLDIERS move boldly toward their pinned victims.
(putting in a fresh clip) Ready?
(pistol up) - Ready -

(pistol up) -Now! Totally prepared to die in a blaze of glory, BARNEY, KONG CHRISTMAS swing into the line of fire. Suddenly the BLAST of supremely SUPERIOR GUNFIRE roars do the CORRIDOR and Garza’s SOLDIERS are torn to shreds. With their WEAPONS still smoking, RICHARD and HALE CAESAR step into view.

Drop!! RICHARD and HALE CAESAR are completely caught off guard b SIX OTHER SOLDIERS who charge into view.  122. As they hit the ground, CHRISTMAS, KONG and BARNEY unload their WEAPONS on the SQUAD of SOLDIERS, dropping them all
The THREE NAVY SEAL ZODIACS have now landed. The LEAD SERGEANT is stopped dead by the sight of a FOURTH ZODIAC short distance away. He pulls off his NVGs.
What’s that? He calls out to his SQUAD LEADER.

Captain, you see this!? The SEAL CAPTAIN angles through his men. It’s HULKING MAR The SERGEANT touches the SEAL insignia on the ‘STRANGE’ ZODIAC. HULKING MARK flips down his NIGHT VISION GOGGLES. Scrawle the Zodiac side is: “The early bird gets the country.”

BARNEY, KONG, CHRISTMAS, RICHARD, MIGUEL FUENTES and SAND race toward a thick peeling wooden door located at the en the hallway. With PAINE and the TWO OPERATIVES’ hands bound behind the backs with PLASTIC CUFFS, they are shoved along by HALE CAESAR.
The heavy OAK DOOR swings open onto the PALACE COURTYARD the men pour out into the darkness. Suddenly the men are hit flush with THREE intense SPOTLIG
(low to Sandra and Miguel) ...-Move away from us. As SANDRA and MIGUEL step to the side, a hundred SOLDIERS step out from the darkness behind the huge spotlights.
GENERAL GARZA savors the visual of his enemies captured below. MONROE nervously paces in the background.
(in Spanish) Drop the weapons or you will be killed now!!
(translating) ..-Drop the weapons or he’1ll kill us.
That’s original.
scan the area looking for survival options. There are non
GARZA’S BALCONY
(to Garza) They’re finished - My men will take it from here.
(ignoring Monroe) Three seconds to drop your weapons or die!! Our heroes remain defiant. PAINE is beginning to panic.
He’1l1 kill all of us!!
Nobody cares about you, Asshole.
- It’s way too public.
(ignoring her)
Drop the weapons!

head_text.subj: GARZA AND MONROE ON THE BALCONY

text: (fighting panic) Let me handle the situation!
- Two! -—
- The world press will hear about this you stupid son of a bitch!
- Three!
BARNEY ’S fingers unfold. A REMOTE SWITCH is revealed in his palm. flicks a secondary SWITCH and a tiny RED LIGHT appears. CHRISTMAS sees this, who nods to KONG, who also spots the light.
Barney’s thumb presses the IGNITION button. The PALACE ERUPTS.
The real NAVY SEALS are double timing it up to the palace when they’re startled by the tremendous explosions.
The PALACE is being blown up in SECTIONS. Tons of mortar CRUMBLE straight down into smoking piles of RUBBLE.
charge into action and commence to unleashing all their f power on the ENEMY.
Behind the attacking ‘EXPENDABLES’ we see the PALACE bein literally dissected by surgical-like detonations.
cuts down THREE SOLDIERS as he sprints for cover behind arches along the COURTYARD WALL. TWO OTHER SOLDIERS flank him, but are blasted away by KONG.
aims high along the COURTYARD and picks off a PAIR of SOLDIERS that crumble into the curled BARBED WIRE.

rolls beneath the TROOP TRUCK and fires at a GROUP of SOLDIERS who are using the vehicle for cover. FOUR TROOPS drop to the ground in agony. CHRISTMAS pulls the pin on a GRENADE and rolls away from the TRUCK, which explodes sky high landing on TWO fleeing SOLDIERS.
shoots out TWO of the HUGE SPOTLIGHTS. Now the COURTYARD nearly enveloped in darkness.
stands beside the large remaining SPOTLIGHT and turns it GROUP of SOLDIERS firing out of the shadows. They fire at HALE CAESAR shattering the light. Returning fire, he kill two.
The structure continues to implode as the lethal charges continue to erupt.
kills ONE SOLDIER who tries to flank him, RICHARD kills ANOTHER that HALE CAESAR has in his sights.
cower as the EXPLOSIONS approach them from OPPOSITE ends the doomed palace.
are caught in a crossfire set up by KONG, CHRISTMAS and H CAESAR.
heaves a grenade at the FRONT GATES, blowing them open.
he riddles the GUARD TOWER with AUTOMATIC FIRE, blowing T SOLDIERS over the side and onto a BURNING TRUCK.
Remain huddled behind smoldering debris.
Blasts TWO SOLDIERS, one of which crashes headlong into t FOUNTAIN.
ducking behind a corner in the courtyard wall, he spins around and catches TWO SOLDIERS by surprise and plugs the both with his .45.
A GROUP of beaten, terrified and cowardly SOLDIERS flee through the damaged GATES.
has managed to free his hands and snatches up a DEAD SOLDIER’S WEAPON.

FOUR SOLDIERS are heading toward the GATE when KONG jumps with a .45 in each hand. Using his amazing kicking abilit coupled with the .45’s, in what seems no more than a spli second, FOUR SOLDIERS are gone.
An ‘agency’ LEARJET is 50 feet above the pathetic runway. Below, several soldiers sprint across the tarmac, heading towards the chaos playing out at the palace.
INT. -— PLANE WILL and LICKSON stare in dismay at the burning PALACE th glows in the distance.  129.
(to pilot) -+-Christ -
watches as MORTAR explodes next to his head. Dropping to knee, he sees PAINE approaching.
ducks behind a STONE STRUCTURE.
C’mon - Let’s finish this!! PAINE fires at BARNEY, who fires back.
C’mon, man to man! BARNEY heaves an object at PAINE. PAINE hears a THUD at h feet. Looking down at the ROUND OBJECT, his eyes widen in sheer panic as the OBJECT EXPLODES.
stepping forward.
...-Man to grenade.
Many of the city’s inhabitants dash from their homes and towards the blazing palace.
Traumatized, they gaze numbly at the destruction below.

head_text.subj: THE ONLY SECTION THAT REMAINS STANDING IS THE NARROW SEVE
STORY HIGH TOWER THAT IS THE GENERAL'S LIVING QUARTERS. T
WALLS ON BOTH SIDES OF THE TOWER ARE COMPLETELY GONE,

text: BARNEY, CHRISTMAS, KONG, HALE CAESAR and RICHARD step fro their battle positions.
goes to SANDRA and helps her up. RICHARD assists MIGUEL FUENTES.
BARNEY notices a FIGURE standing next to GARZA. He faces of the BOUND AMERICAN OPERATIVES.
..-Who’s that with Garza?
Her name’s Monroe. BARNEY'S expression tightens.
Oh.
They helplessly stare down SEVEN STORIES below. MONROE crosses to a jagged LEDGE and stiffens at the sight of a growing mob of citizens arriving.
step forward with SANDRA and FUENTES. CHRISTMAS glances u GARZA’S barely upright TOWER.
- How'd we miss that?
(to Barney) ...Thank you from myself and these people. CHRISTMAS tightens the tourniquet on his wounded arm. SAN applies pressure. KONG looks unimpressed.
- Suck it up. HALE CAESAR wipes the sweat from his forehead. He nods towards SANDRA.
(coyly) . . ...-How’re you this evening, Mam? A DEEP VOICE is heard off screen.
What the hell!? BARNEY and the team swivel around.
You were the target?!
Yeah.
Did you know we were coming? How’d you know we’d be sent in 24 hours early? How?  132.
Just did.
But you couldn’t know for sure you'd beat us here. How the hell did you know our ETA!? BARNEY glances at RICHARD.
We always trained to hit our targets at 5 AM.
EXT. BARNEY’S TRUCK - NIGHT
BARNEY and HULKING MARK
I want someone you’ve worked with directly. Someone you've seen operate.
- I got the guy -
Son of a bitch.
What happened here? What’d you do? BARNEY turns and sees WILL arriving with LICKSON.
Amazing.
Who the hell’s he?
We go way back.  133.
You’re on foreign soil - illegally. There’s a mandate making all of you subject to criminal arrest.
You have no jurisdiction over here.
(to Will) He’s right - Only on American soil.

(to Will) You want to bring somebody in - a guy named Church and his friend, a German named Helmut Ernst, ‘oil boys’ - He hired us to overthrow the General and take over themselves - Might have a case there.
Where’s the proof? BARNEY withdraws a MICRO-RECORDER and presses the PLAY BUTTON.
(Church’s voice) “,..I want General Garza assassinated, I want his palace leveled -” (clicks it off)
Kind of flimsy, but it’s a start - They’1l probably be at the airfield in about 15 minutes. We hear MONROE’S voice calling out.
If anyone can hear this -
GENERAL GARZA’S BALCONY
I’m not part of this - I’m an American Government Official.
Is that Monroe?
Yes.
On the crumbling PALACE TOWER.
(to Garza) Say something for Christ’s sake! GARZA steps forward.

(in Spanish) Everyone - You know me! I am one of you! One of the people who loves this country, loves this land, and will die before I will allow the corrupt government of the United States to enslave our people, like this woman next to me who is trying to steal our country!
I understand Spanish, Bastard!
BARNEY glances over at SANDRA’S very bruised face.  SANDRA is 135.
Sandra - What do you want to do with Garza? at a loss for words.
He should be tried by the people.
I’m talking to her, Presidente.
(to Barney) Seriously, I have a hole in my arm.
Almost done.
There’s a high ranking agency official standing next to Garza - Think this through.
Okay. (to Sandra) Want to blow Garza up? You earned it.
What you’1ll do is leave them both alive!! That’s what you’1l do! I’1l1 bring Monroe down for this!
MONROE is enraged and steps to the edge of the CRUMBLING TOWER.

I know there are American soldiers out there, as well as mercenaries who are here illegally and will be dealt with - I’m being held here against my will!! I need the SEALS to come forward and take me into protective custody now!
They observe MONROE yelling in the background.
They’11l both be prosecuted back in the states.
That’1l never happen, Young lady, but I’1l leave it up to you both - Fair enough?
...Deal. BARNEY extends his hand. Though hesitant, WILL extends hi and they SHAKE.
You have the right and responsibility to escort me -
CLOSE UP: BARNEY AND WILL’S HANDS Unknowing, WILL squeezes the DETONATOR resting in BARNEY' palm.
(continuing) - Safely back to the United States without any further-
A GIGANTIC EXPLOSION rips the bottom of the TOWER apart, sending it thundering down on MONROE and GARZA.
...Guess we’re done here.
Oh, my God.
(to Barney) We wanted to turn him over to the people.  137.
(walking past) Better get a mop.
Did he just blow up a “high ranking agency official.”
Apparently.
(moves off) I‘1l be waiting in the plane. WILL exhales heavily while idly removing his glasses, whi he slowly wipes clean with the bottom portion of his tie.
Now what?
They’1l bury it like everything else - Take care, Will. WILL nods and stares at the crumbled TOWER.
...Yeah. BARNEY hands SANDRA a SLIP OF PAPER.
Follow the instructions, there’s enough in the account to get things around here going. BARNEY hugs SANDRA then faces MIGUEL FUENTES.
Hey, watch who you do business with. (walks off)
Why’d you come back?
(passing by) ‘Cause you got ‘face,’ Baby, if you were ugly, you'd be dead.  138.
Ignore the black guy.
You are ‘tonto.’ It was foolish to come back.
No it wasn’t.
Where’re you going now?
Home - Here, put this on - CHRISTMAS pulls out the THREE CARAT RUBY RING that he had bought for LACY.
Good - It fits.
But what does this mean?

Nothing really - Maybe you’1l be nicer next time I come to visit - Take care, Sandra. She hugs then kisses CHRISTMAS and he jogs up to the departing TEAM and together THE EXPENDABLES walk away fro the PALACE that SMOLDERS in the background until they disappear into the darkness.
EXT. HALE CAESAR’S - NIGHT It’s late when BARNEY exits. Moving toward his TRUCK that parked out front, he hears his name called.
...Barney. Turning, BARNEY observes a familiar presence approaching.
Tracking me again?
No - Nothing like that.  139.
Any fallout over Monroe?
(shrugs ) .-+.They buried it.
(nods ) You retire?
Quit - How’s business these days?
Something on your mind?
I don’t know - I’ve got a lot of time on my hands. BARNEY smiles and WILL returns the gesture.
...Let’s walk and talk, Will. The CAMERA cranes up as the one time adversaries meander into the balmy night.
